value.title: StarCraft 2: Dark's OVERWHELMING Aggression... Backfires!
value.excerpt: In this video I cast a StarCraft 2 match between Dark, a Korean Zerg player, and Cyan, a Chinese Protoss player. Dark tries to overwhelm Cyan with his aggressive and relentless attacks, but Cyan manages to defend and counter with his superior army and technology. Watch as Dark‚Äôs overconfidence backfires
